Headline: #81 Lawrence Temporary Reroute at Lawrence/Sheridan
ShortDescription: 81 Lawrence buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Lawrence, Sheridan and Wilson due to street blockage near Lawrence/Sheridan.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#81 Lawrence buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Lawrence, Sheridan and Wilson due to street blockage near Lawrence/Sheridan.

Allow extra travel time.
